entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:39 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: S 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Periods of drizzle beginning this evening changing to periods of rain later this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
